text: Juna bela uniharu ‘‘da'udako’’ pasama a'e, tyatikhera uni uniharusita tarsihale. Uniharule bhane ki bhaya nagara, hami duvaiko e'uta mudda cha ki, hamimadhye e'utale arkosita an'yaya gareko cha, tasartha tapa'inle hamrobicama thika–thika nirnaya garidinus. Ra an'yaya nagarnuhola ra hamila'i sojho bato dekha'idinus
